00110000000000000000000000000000 //andi $0, $0, 0
00110000100001000000000000000000 //andi $4, $4, 0
00100000100001000000000000001010 //addi $4, $4, 10
00100000101001010000000000010100 //addi $5, $5, 20
000000_00001_00101_00010_00000_100000 //add $2, $1, $5
000000_00001_00100_00011_00000_100000 //add $3, $1, $4
